meanings.sent1: The balloon remained unpierced by the sharp needle.
meanings.sent2: The armor was strong and unpierced by any weapon.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's unpierced shield deflected all attacks effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her unpierced determination to succeed was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The unpierced sky was clear and endless above them.

meanings.definition: Not having a hole or opening made by piercing
meanings.sent1: The unpierced paper was smooth and intact.
meanings.sent2: The unpierced fabric was perfect for the project.
meanings.sent3: The unpierced donut looked oddly whole.
meanings.sent4: Her unpierced earlobes were a unique feature.
meanings.sent5: The unpierced wall showed no signs of wear or tear.

meanings.definition: Not having been pierced or punctured
meanings.sent1: The unpierced skin was unblemished and healthy.
meanings.sent2: The unpierced fruit was fresh and ripe.
meanings.sent3: The unpierced tire rolled smoothly on the road.
meanings.sent4: His unpierced heart was full of hope and love.
meanings.sent5: The unpierced bubble floated gracefully in the air.
